@shiniy wrote:

yes go to autospawm.cfg and u need to open it with notepad look at this

//--Start Of Shops spawn = 522 2740 3471 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Stuff_Shop spawn = 553 2739 3471 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Range_Supplies spawn = 526 2738 3471 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Mage_Supplies spawn = 577 2737 3471 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Melee_Uniform spawn = 580 2736 3471 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Pk_Supplies spawn = 538 2740 3473 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Junk_Store spawn = 546 2739 3473 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Food_Shop spawn = 538 2738 3473 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 cloth_Store spawn = 548 2737 3473 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Herblore_Shop spawn = 551 2736 3473 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Fletshing_Shop spawn = 1700 2740 3472 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Farming_Shop spawn = 278 2739 3472 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Cooking_Shop spawn = 584 2738 3472 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Crafting_Shop spawn = 2475 2739 3470 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Welcome spawn = 2475 3088 3514 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Welcome spawn = 170 3086 3514 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Players spawn = 170 2737 3470 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Players //--End Of Shops
and u see were the cordinates are u just change were u wanted them to be idk if urs is like this or not it might be difrend
